item.title: Are Eye Floaters Linked to Screen Addiction or Burnout?
item.description:
You’ve been staring at screens all day. You’re fried. You feel a little spaced out — and then the floaters show up.
Or worse… you can’t stop noticing them.

It’s a growing pattern people are starting to ask about:

Are eye floaters linked to screen addiction or burnout?

The answer? Not directly. But if you’re constantly plugged in, overwhelmed, and chasing dopamine through screens — your floaters can become a loud and persistent symptom of a deeper issue.
